System catalog providing queryable metadata about tables, fields, and indexes.

detaileddescription.para:
The system catalog stores metadata in three special tables:
_sys_tables: Information about all tables
_sys_fields: Information about all fields/columns
_sys_indexes: Information about secondary indexes (NEW!)
These tables are queryable using the same expression template and lambda query interface as regular tables, but are read-only to prevent corruption.
